title: Multilayer Ti3C2Tx MXene Electrode Decorated with Polypyridine for Efficient Symmetric Supercapacitor
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00892H, Paper
Peng Lin, Sibo Wang, Ailing Liu, Ting Yi, Hui Wang, Song Xue, Xueping Zong
MXene, being a unique two-dimensional nanomaterial, has the advantage of large spacing and conductive layered structures, providing great potential for enhancing the electrochemical properties of supercapacitors. However, the van der...
